tooltip.tacionian.energy_stabilizer.desc: §7Prevents damage from §bTx overload §7while in your inventory.
tooltip.tacionian.basic_charger_item.des: §7Slowly charges items in your inventory by consuming your §bTx §7energy.
tooltip.tacionian.safe_charger_item.desc: §7Smart charger. Stops working if your §bTx §7level drops below 15%.
tooltip.tacionian.stabilization_plate.de: §7Creates a safety zone. Stabilizes your §bTx Core §7while you stand on it.
tooltip.tacionian.energy_reservoir.desc: §7Right-click to store energy. Shift+Right-click to take it back.
tooltip.tacionian.wireless_interface.des: §7Wirelessly extracts energy from nearby players to power adjacent machines.
tooltip.tacionian.safe_charger_block.des: §7Stationary device that transfers player energy to FE machines.
